oh nice, what build do you use?

So for Masteries (Ekko Jungle)
Domination 
-Dark Harvest
-Sudden Impact
-Eyeball Collection
-Ravenous Hunter

Sorcery
-Celerity
-Water Walking

Items
Start Hunters Talisman and refillable potions
(If you are ahead pick up a dark seal if you get it to 10 stacks get Mejais your move speed will help you dominate)
1 Finish Jungle Item Runic echoes (red for Damage reduction and true damage)
2 If you are even or ahead get Lich Bane 
3 Pick up a defensive item either Banshees or Zhoya's whatever will help you more
4 Then I like to get Morello for Magic Penetration and grevious wounds. (plus some health does not hurt)

Now boots you can either get 1 of 3 pending on the situation
If enemy team has a lot of CC go for Mercury Treads
if not then you have a choice of Sorcerers shoes, or CD boots.

Final Build Example 
(having a good game)
Mejais
Sorcerer Shoes
Runic Echoes Red
Lich Bane
Zhonya's or Banshee's 
Morello
(potion Iron Elixer) - Now I got for Iron Elixer for extra HP and Tenacity, plus you leave a path of iron which means your team can catch up to you since youll be flying around with Mejais +10%, Lich bane +7%, Waterwalking, celerity, and boots. should be close to 500 move speed without any cloud drakes.

Lich bane proc + Dark Harvest on your E is absolutely disgusting and end game can completely Devistate a squishy target especially if you have the sorc shoes +18 Magic Penn, and Morello +15 Magic Penn, (sudden impact). Dark Harvest with do magic damage. it can be pretty insane. If you are able to get Mejais you will be flying around the map making plays in every lane, because once yo have around 440 move speed 1 end of the map to the other is not that long. when you are not ganking Farm for that Dark Harvest. once its over 150 it takes care of itself and its an absolute teamfight destroyer resetting on kills.
wow thanks so much, this help alot. i appreciate it !!!!
Works quite well, whenever I go jg I usually use him.  And he functions quite well with Dark Harvest and has strong ganks throughout the entire game
It can work very well if you path right. His w is a great ganking tool and he does not need a whole lot of ap for decent dmg. Try norms first though.
